label: POSITIVE
commitMessage:
Creators & IO now works with full Generic types. You cannot infer the type of Compound used from the Sequence unfortunately so we need to keep on passing the generic type of compound through the code. This is not ideal.

git-svn-id: http://code.open-bio.org/repos/biojava/biojava-live/trunk@7534 7c6358e6-4a41-0410-a743-a5b2a554c398
